name: Soul Breaks Free
description: *sound on* havoc in the fields, when the soul breaks free Elysium Perdita.   Poem by Emily Dickinson - Animated from the painting by Karl Friedrich Schinkel 1815 - music distorted from a public domain recording of Violin Concerto in G minor, RV 315 'Summer' - I. Allegro - Produced and performed by Laurence Fuller @laurencefuller
